comments.body: Forgive me if I'm wrong but I would assume return values should stay consistently laid out like in other facts modules such as [ec2_asg_facts](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/cloud/amazon/ec2_asg_facts.py). I've had a few occasions recently where I've found lacking documentation so I reckon it should be be laid out the same way.

diffHunk:

RETURN = '''
vpn_connections:
    description: List of one or more VPN Connections.

comments.body: This sample isn't right anymore. The tags are run through `tag_list_to_ansible_dict` now.
